name: ROYAL BATTLESHIP
description:
In this idle ship shooting game, you start off with a basic ship that you can upgrade as you progress through waves of enemies. You can earn currency by defeating enemies and use it to upgrade your ship's weapons, armor, and other abilities. As you become stronger, you'll face tougher enemy waves, each with their own unique abilities and weaknesses.

The ultimate goal is to face off against a powerful boss at the end of the game. To defeat the boss, you'll need to strategize and utilize all of the upgrades you've accumulated along the way. The game also includes an idle feature, allowing you to continue earning currency even when you're not actively playing. So sit back, relax, and watch your ship dominate the enemy waves in this exciting and challenging idle ship shooting game.
